snippet.title: Sonic Unleashed - Shamar Adventure Pack DLC [60FPS HDR] [XBOX SERIES X]
snippet.description:
This video showcases all the DLC Levels from the Shamar Adventure Pack in Sonic Unleashed running on Xbox Series X. Sonic Unleashed supports Auto HDR and now 60FPS thanks to FPS Boost! Thumbnail Sonic Render was created by KolnzBerserK.

KolnzBerserK - https://www.deviantart.com/kolnzberserk/art/Mario-And-Sonic-Rio-2016-Olympic-Games-Render-801885060

SONIC UNLEASHED XBOX SERIES X LEVELS (60FPS)
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQ-I9vhiyKbIJeP_YkZs--rKiTIgpy_e7

SONIC UNLEASHED XBOX SERIES X DLC (60FPS)
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLQ-I9vhiyKbL030GBzhfpPEFTIrOzx9gC

►GAME DESCRIPTION
On a quest for domination once more, Dr. Eggman unleashes a slumbering beast from the center of the world. The event causes a devastating tremor that splinters the world into seven continents and triggers a hair-raising transformation in Sonic. With the world divided and Sonic altered with new abilities and powers, the stage is set for a climactic battle. For when the sun sets, a whole new adventure awakens!
